price: 17. Poco era lo que dormían por las noches y mucho lo que rezaban.
arabic: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: kānū qalīlan mina al-layli mā yahjaʿūna
